resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API
Make sure you set up your location as follows
Place the device you will be using about 1.5 meters above the ground
It is strongly recommended if the application is used for whole days and not for short moments
The scan for the detection of the person requires, for obvious reasons, the permission to be able to use the camera
Users who will undergo the scan will be saved here, so you can know whether or not they wore the mask at the entrance
Show a number of additional options such as number of frames, the crop, the inference time and manage the numbers of threads
When a person without a mask is detected, an alarm sound will inform of their presence. Likewise, when a person wearing a mask is detected, a soothing sound will inform their presence
Designed and developed by Giorgio Cantoni
